summary: An email from July 10, 2019, discussing the potential execution of a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence the following day for digital media and computer equipment. It notes that most of the C20 team is in Florida interviewing victims and requests assistance for the New York operation.

persons.name: Slianiff
persons.context: Wrote the initial email requesting assistance for a potential search warrant execution at Epstein's Manhattan residence, noting that most of C20 is in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: CC'ed on the email regarding assistance for the search warrant execution; individuals are asked to respond back to the sender and SSA.

connections.description: Collaborating on organizing assistance for a law enforcement operation; Slianiff is coordinating and SSA is copied for oversight.

events.title: Planned Search of Epstein's Manhattan Residence
events.description: C20 may execute another search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

events.title: C20 Team Interviews Victims in Florida
events.description: Most of the C20 team is in Florida conducting victim interviews as part of the investigation.

keyFacts: A search warrant for digital media and computer equipment was potentially scheduled for execution at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence on July 11, 2019.
The C20 investigative team was primarily deployed in Florida interviewing victims at the time, creating a need for additional assistance in New York.
The email demonstrates active, multi-state investigative efforts into Epstein shortly before his arrest in July 2019.
